topics.body:
it's goddamn six am and my piece of shit 12 year old brother is playing motherfuckin video games

holy hell with a buttfuck side of shit, now i have to listen to his faggy bassless voice as i try to sleep again

this shit's inhuman, nobody should be subjected to this

yeah no that voice is far too irritating for me to get back to sleep; what a pleasant way to wake up

almost like having that popular flute melody being played by an out of tune cello right outside your door, it's divine
